H0.text: what was the name of jfk's brothers. Robert Kennedy

H1.text: what was the name of jfk's brothers. Joseph Kennedy Jr.

H2.text: what was the name of jfk's brothers. John Connally

H3.text: what was the name of jfk's brothers. Ted Kennedy

A4.text: Joseph Patrick Kennedy, Jr. was the eldest of the nine children born to Joseph P. Kennedy Sr. and Rose Fitzgerald Kennedy.

A5.text: The USS Joseph P. Kennedy Jr. was named after Joseph P. Kennedy Jr., and his younger brother, the future U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy, briefly served on it.

A6.text: JFK wrote a letter regarding the death of his brother Joe Kennedy Jr.

A7.text: An eye witness account of the plane crash involving Joe Kennedy Jr. exists in BlythburghWeb.co.uk
